resources.string: Bill Amount: Rp.%1$s Percent: %2$s Total to Pay: Rp.%3$.2f

This application is designed to simplify the process of calculating the total bill, including tax. With this tool, you can easily determine the exact amount you owe, ensure the accuracy of your expenses, manage business invoices, or handle personal finances, this app helps you avoid calculation errors and provides a smooth experience in estimating bills.
